bibl.title: The Nile Police in the Ptolemaic Period.
The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power.

bibl.note: Focuses on the institutions (including the potamophylakes) and various measures by means of which the government and administration of Ptolemaic Egypt tried to secure the safety of shipping on the Nile.
bibl.seg: Thomas Kruse, The Nile Police in the Ptolemaic Period.
Kostas Buraselis, Mary Stefanou & Dorothy J. Thompson (edd.), The Ptolemies, the Sea and the Nile. Studies in Waterborne Power (Cambridge, 2013) pp. 172-184.

Focuses on the institutions (including the potamophylakes) and various measures by means of which the government and administration of Ptolemaic Egypt tried to secure the safety of shipping on the Nile.
